title: Ops manual: capture income, expense, or liability
purpose: To capture income, expense, or liability in the accounting system.
trigger: When a transaction occurs that involves income, expense, or liability.
process:
1. Open the accounting system.
2. Select the appropriate module (e.g., income, expense, liability).
3. Enter the transaction details (e.g., date, amount, description).
4. Save the transaction.
outputs: The transaction is recorded in the accounting system.
